CustomField.formula: If(ISPICKVAL(Pull_Product_From_Distributor__c, 'Yes'), 'A Distributor Pull Sample for ' & SRCustomer_Name__r.Name & ' ' & Sample_Request_No__c & ' has been processed', 'A Sample for ' & SRCustomer_Name__r.Name & ' ' & Sample_Request_No__c & ' has been requested for delivery on ' & TEXT(MONTH(Requested_Delivery_Date__c)) & '-' & TEXT(DAY(Requested_Delivery_Date__c)) & '-' & TEXT(YEAR(Requested_Delivery_Date__c)))
CustomField.label: Email Subject
